projects.title: Iconic Aesthetics
projects.shortDescription: Complete digital transformation with integrated booking and POS systems
projects.longDescription: Iconic Aesthetics needed a complete digital overhaul to modernize their brand and streamline operations. We delivered a premium website featuring a fully integrated booking system, Square POS integration, and comprehensive marketing automation. The platform not only elevated their online presence but also transformed their day-to-day operations, saving 8+ hours per week in administrative tasks.
projects.challenge: Iconic Aesthetics was losing clients to competitors with better online booking systems. Their manual scheduling process was time-consuming and prone to errors, resulting in double bookings and missed appointments.
projects.solution: We developed a custom website with real-time booking synchronization, automated appointment reminders, and seamless POS integration. The system includes inventory tracking, client management, and detailed analytics.
projects.impact: Within 3 months of launch, online bookings increased by 145%, administrative time decreased by 70%, and client satisfaction scores improved from 3.8 to 4.9 stars.

testimonial.text: Elan transformed our entire digital presence. The integrated booking system alone has saved us countless hours and our online bookings increased by 145%. The ROI has been incredible - we've seen a 3x return on our investment within the first 6 months. Absolutely phenomenal work!
testimonial.author: Ilanit Sholomov

projects.title: Barber World NYC
projects.shortDescription: E-commerce platform generating $12K revenue in first month
projects.longDescription: Barber World NYC wanted to expand beyond their brick-and-mortar location by launching an online store. We created a comprehensive e-commerce platform with 76 products, automated inventory management, and integrated digital marketing. The result exceeded all expectations with 100+ sales and $12,000 in gross revenue within the first 30 days.
projects.challenge: The client had no online presence and needed to quickly establish an e-commerce platform that could handle inventory across both physical and digital storefronts while maintaining brand consistency.
projects.solution: We built a Shopify-based e-commerce platform with custom theme development, integrated inventory management syncing with their physical POS system, implemented automated marketing funnels, and created compelling product photography and descriptions.
projects.impact: Achieved 100+ sales in the first month, generated $12K in revenue, expanded customer reach by 300%, and created a scalable platform for future growth.

testimonial.text: The e-commerce platform Elan built for us is incredible. Our sales tripled in the first quarter. The inventory management system makes running our business so much easier. We went from zero online presence to becoming a recognized brand in our niche.
testimonial.author: Management Team

projects.title: Doug Uhlig Psychological Services
projects.shortDescription: HIPAA-compliant platform generating 625 new clients in first year
projects.longDescription: Dr. Doug Uhlig needed a complete digital transformation for his psychology practice. We created a fully HIPAA-compliant website with a secure patient portal, telehealth capabilities, and integrated marketing systems. The comprehensive solution not only met strict healthcare regulations but also generated 625 new clients in the first year through strategic digital marketing.
projects.challenge: Creating a platform that balances user experience with strict HIPAA compliance requirements while integrating telehealth capabilities and secure document sharing for sensitive patient information.
projects.solution: We developed a custom HIPAA-compliant platform with end-to-end encryption, secure patient portal with document sharing, integrated telehealth video sessions, automated appointment reminders, and HIPAA-compliant email marketing.
projects.impact: Generated 625 new clients in year one, achieved 100% HIPAA compliance certification, improved patient satisfaction by 85%, and reduced administrative overhead by 60%.

testimonial.text: As a psychology practice, HIPAA compliance is absolutely critical. Elan delivered a secure, professional website with a patient portal that meets all requirements while still being user-friendly. Our patients love the convenience, and the telehealth integration has been a game-changer. The marketing campaign brought in 625 new clients in our first year!
testimonial.author: Douglas Uhlig, Ph.D.

projects.title: Laura's Beauty Touch
projects.shortDescription: Premium beauty clinic website with successful Google Ads campaign
projects.longDescription: Laura's Beauty Touch wanted to establish a strong digital presence that matched the luxury experience of their physical location. We created a stunning website with an elegant design, integrated booking system, and launched a comprehensive Google Ads campaign that drove consistent client bookings and elevated their brand reputation in a competitive market.
projects.challenge: Standing out in a saturated beauty market while conveying the premium, luxury experience that Laura's clinic provides. The website needed to attract high-value clients willing to pay premium prices.
projects.solution: We designed a visually stunning website with professional photography, implemented strategic Google Ads targeting affluent demographics, created compelling service descriptions emphasizing luxury and results, and integrated seamless online booking.
projects.impact: Increased bookings by 180%, attracted high-value clients with 40% higher average transaction value, achieved 4.8/5 Google rating, and established Laura's as a premium brand in the NYC beauty market.

testimonial.text: Working with Elan was seamless from start to finish. They understood our vision for the beauty clinic and delivered a stunning website that perfectly represents our brand. Our clients are constantly complimenting the website, and the Google Ads campaign has been incredibly effective. We've seen a significant increase in high-value clients!
testimonial.author: Laura Sholomov

projects.title: Holistic Mental Health Services
projects.shortDescription: Comprehensive mental health platform with appointment scheduling
projects.longDescription: Holistic Mental Health Services needed a modern, welcoming website that could handle their growing practice while maintaining a warm, approachable feel. We built a comprehensive platform with integrated appointment scheduling, resource library, and blog that has become a trusted source of mental health information while driving significant client growth.
projects.challenge: Creating a website that feels warm and approachable while handling complex scheduling for multiple therapists, various appointment types, and insurance verification.
projects.solution: Developed a custom appointment system that handles multiple providers, created a comprehensive resource library with mental health articles and videos, implemented SEO strategy targeting local mental health searches, and designed calming, accessible user interface.
projects.impact: Client bookings increased by 220%, became top-ranked for local mental health searches, reduced phone inquiries by 50% through self-service scheduling, and established the practice as a thought leader in holistic mental health.

testimonial.text: Elan built us a comprehensive mental health services platform that's both beautiful and functional. The appointment scheduling system has streamlined our entire practice, and our clients love how easy it is to book and manage their appointments. The SEO work has been phenomenal - we're now the top result for mental health services in our area!
testimonial.author: Kristie Doheny

projects.title: Park City 3&4
projects.longDescription: Park City 3&4 needed a custom property management solution to handle their growing portfolio of properties. We developed a comprehensive platform with tenant portal, maintenance tracking, payment processing, and communication systems that completely transformed their operations and improved tenant satisfaction.
projects.challenge: Managing communications, maintenance requests, and payments for multiple properties across different buildings with no centralized system, leading to inefficiencies and tenant frustration.
projects.solution: Built a custom property management platform with tenant self-service portal, automated maintenance request routing, online rent payment with automatic late fee processing, document storage and lease management, and real-time reporting dashboard for owners.
projects.impact: Reduced administrative time by 65%, improved tenant satisfaction scores by 75%, decreased average maintenance response time from 48 hours to 8 hours, and increased on-time rent payments by 40%.

testimonial.text: The property management system Elan developed has completely transformed how we operate. Tenant communications, maintenance requests, rent collection - everything is now streamlined and efficient. Our tenants love the self-service portal, and we've cut our administrative workload in half. This was worth every penny!
testimonial.author: David Javidan

projects.title: East Coast Realty
projects.shortDescription: Professional real estate website with IDX property listings
projects.longDescription: East Coast Realty needed a professional website that could showcase their property listings, generate leads, and establish them as market leaders. We created a sophisticated real estate platform with MLS integration, advanced property search, and lead generation systems that significantly improved their online presence and client engagement.
projects.challenge: Creating a real estate website that stands out in a crowded market while integrating with MLS systems for real-time property listings and implementing effective lead capture without being pushy.
projects.solution: Developed custom IDX integration for real-time MLS listings, created advanced property search with map view and filters, implemented smart lead capture forms with CRM integration, built agent profile pages with individual performance tracking, and optimized for local real estate SEO.
projects.impact: Generated 450+ qualified leads in first 6 months, increased website traffic by 320%, improved search rankings to first page for 15+ target keywords, and reduced cost-per-lead by 55%.

testimonial.text: Elan created a real estate website that truly represents our brand and expertise. The IDX integration works flawlessly, and the lead generation has exceeded our expectations. We've generated over 450 qualified leads in the first six months, and our online presence has never been stronger.
testimonial.author: Management Team

projects.title: Cohen & Associates
projects.shortDescription: Professional legal services website with secure client portal
projects.longDescription: Cohen & Associates, a prestigious law firm, required a website that conveyed their expertise and credibility while providing secure client communications. We developed a professional platform with a secure client portal, case management integration, and comprehensive service information that has significantly improved their client experience and online presence.
projects.challenge: Creating a website that projects authority and trust for a law firm while implementing bank-level security for client communications and document sharing.
projects.solution: Designed a sophisticated, professional website emphasizing credibility, developed secure client portal with encrypted messaging and document sharing, created comprehensive practice area pages with case studies, implemented attorney profiles highlighting expertise and credentials, and optimized for legal industry SEO.
projects.impact: Increased consultation requests by 190%, improved client communication efficiency by 70%, reduced time spent on client inquiries by 50%, and achieved first-page rankings for multiple high-value legal keywords.

testimonial.text: Elan delivered exactly what we needed - a professional website that conveys our expertise while providing secure communication tools for our clients. The client portal has been particularly valuable, streamlining our case communications and document sharing. Our consultation requests have nearly doubled!
testimonial.author: Senior Partner

projects.title: S-Cream
projects.shortDescription: E-commerce platform for successful product launch
projects.longDescription: S-Cream needed to launch their innovative product with a bang. We created a modern, conversion-optimized e-commerce platform combined with a comprehensive marketing campaign that successfully introduced the product to market and generated strong initial sales.
projects.challenge: Launching a new product in a competitive market with zero brand recognition, requiring both an e-commerce platform and marketing strategy to generate immediate traction.
projects.solution: Built conversion-optimized e-commerce site with compelling product storytelling, implemented pre-launch email campaign building anticipation, created social media marketing strategy with influencer partnerships, designed eye-catching product packaging and photography, and launched targeted paid advertising across multiple channels.
projects.impact: Sold out initial inventory within 2 weeks, generated 1,200+ email subscribers pre-launch, achieved 8.5% conversion rate (industry average is 2-3%), and built strong social media following of 5,000+ in first month.

testimonial.text: Elan turned our product launch into a huge success. The website is beautiful, the marketing strategy was on point, and we sold out our initial inventory in just two weeks. The e-commerce platform makes managing orders incredibly easy. We couldn't be happier!
testimonial.author: Founder

projects.title: Century One Properties
projects.shortDescription: Property management platform with tenant communication system
projects.longDescription: Century One Properties manages a diverse portfolio of residential and commercial properties. We created a comprehensive property management solution with tenant portal, maintenance tracking, and communication systems that improved operational efficiency and tenant satisfaction across all properties.
projects.challenge: Managing a diverse portfolio of properties with different needs while maintaining consistent communication and service quality across all tenants and properties.
projects.solution: Developed flexible property management platform handling both residential and commercial properties, created unified tenant communication system across all properties, implemented automated rent reminders and late fee processing, built maintenance request system with vendor management, and designed owner dashboard with property-specific analytics.
projects.impact: Streamlined operations across 50+ properties, increased tenant retention by 35%, reduced vacancy periods by 45%, and improved owner satisfaction with detailed reporting and transparency.

testimonial.text: The property management platform Elan created has revolutionized how we operate. Managing 50+ properties used to be overwhelming, but now everything is centralized and automated. Our tenants are happier, our owners are more informed, and our team is more productive. Exceptional work!
testimonial.author: Property Manager
